title: Hello, Hanpen
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Hey, this is Hanpen, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. Hanpen, say hello to Kanan-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Aha, it’s okay. She doesn’t have to. Cats can be so moody.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>But......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hello, Hanpen. I’m Kanan. Nice to meet you. I’m gonna hang out with Rina-chan today...... Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hanpen is snuggling against you. I think she likes you, Kanan-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmmm, maybe this is her way of greeting me after you told her to say hello.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Of course. Hanpen loves Rina-chan, doesn’t she? I’m going to play hard with Rina-chan today! Don’t worry, Hanpen!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hanpen, I’m gonna go play with Kanan-san today. I’ll talk to you about it tomorrow.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
